rows.label: qst100608_msg0001
rows.name:
It's too heavily guarded,
mo! It must contain Bahn's
hidden assets, mo!

rows.label: qst100608_msg0002
rows.name:
Can't you somehow open it with the
power of a Blade-san, like you
showed me at the beginning, mo?

rows.label: qst100608_msg0101
rows.name:
Amazing, mo! It makes me
want to recruit you into the
Special Audit Bureau, mo!

rows.label: qst100608_msg0102
rows.name:
So, what was inside...
Lots of... letters?

rows.label: qst100608_msg0103
rows.name:
What kind of corrupt business
dealings are these...?

rows.label: qst100608_msg0104
rows.name:
'To Bahn, Are you doing well, mo?
Are you eating too much, mo? Are
you being kind to people, mo?'

rows.label: qst100608_msg0105
rows.name:
'I heard from a little bird that
you've become a fine Nopon, mo.'

rows.label: qst100608_msg0106
rows.name:
'If your father were well, we
would come to visit you, but...'

rows.label: qst100608_msg0107
rows.name:
'I know you're busy, but please
come and show your face
sometimes, mo. - From Mother'

rows.label: qst100608_msg0109
rows.name:
Waaaaah... It's a loving
letter from his mother, mo~~

rows.label: qst100608_msg0110
rows.name:
Nilny is super weak to
this kind of thing, mo~

rows.label: qst100608_msg0111
rows.name:
Even a villainous merchant
like Bahn would cherish
letters from his mother...

rows.label: qst100608_msg0112
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I'm sorry for doubting
you, mo~ Waaaaaah~~

rows.label: qst100608_msg0114
rows.name:
Nilny will now check all these
letters one by one, mo.

rows.label: qst100608_msg0115
rows.name:
I feel bad for looking at his private
things, but... it's my job, mo!
